update sequipment_tbl
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
se_name = #{seName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_number = #{fileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detection_time = #{detectionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sequipment_tbl set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, se_name = #{seName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_number = #{fileNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detection_time = #{detectionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into sequipment_tbl (user_id, se_name, type, file_number, amount, detection_time, expiration_time, remark ) values
(${userId}, #{item.seName}, #{item.type}, #{item.fileNumber},#{item.amount},#{item.detectionTime},#{item.expirationTime},#{item.remark})

insert into sequipment_tbl (user_id, se_name, type, file_number, amount, detection_time, expiration_time, remark ) values
(#{item.userId}, #{item.seName}, #{item.type}, #{item.fileNumber},#{item.amount},#{item.detectionTime},#{item.expirationTime},#{item.remark})
mapper.select:
select
from sequipment_tbl where user_id=#{userId}
and remark LIKE CONCAT('%', #{remark},'%')
order by id desc
